mapper.select: SELECT SEQ ,REGDATE ,CONTENT AS C_CONTENT ,ID ,REPORTED_ID , PROCESS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) RN, r.SEQ ,r.REGDATE ,c.CONTENT ,r.ID ,r.REPORTED_ID ,r.PROCESS FROM REPORTLIST r,REPORT_CATEGORY c WHERE r.CATEGORY_SEQ =c.CODE ) WHERE CEIL(RN/10)=#{pnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORTLIST SET PROCESS =#{process} WHERE SEQ =#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT RN, ID , NICKNAME, ALLCOUNT, COMPLETE, DELFLAG FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY m.REGDATE) AS rn, m.ID, m.NICKNAME, NVL(cc.ALLCOUNT, 0) AS allcount, NVL(cc.COMPLETE, 0) AS complete ,m.DELFLAG FROM (SELECT c.reported_id, c.allcount, COUNT(c.PROCESS) OVER(PARTITION BY c.PROCESS) AS COMPLETE FROM (SELECT REPORTED_ID, COUNT(SEQ) OVER(PARTITION BY REPORTED_ID) AS allcount, PROCESS FROM REPORTLIST ) c WHERE c.PROCESS = 'COMPLETE') cc , "MEMBER" m WHERE m.ID = cc.REPORTED_ID(+)) WHERE CEIL(RN/20)=#{pnum}

SELECT m.ID , m.NICKNAME, m.DELFLAG ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NVL(r.regdate,'1111-11-11') DESC ) AS SEQ, r.CONTENT,r.regdate,r.process FROM (SELECT r1.REPORTED_ID, r1.CONTENT , r1.REGDATE , r1.PROCESS,r2.CONTENT AS C_CONTENT FROM REPORTLIST r1, REPORT_CATEGORY r2 WHERE r1.CATEGORY_SEQ = r2.CODE) r, "MEMBER" m WHERE m.ID = r.REPORTED_ID(+) AND m.ID =#{id}
